name: Crime Diaries: Night Out
description: After going to a Halloween party, college student Luis Andrés Colmenares is found dead. Was it an accident or murder? Inspired by true events.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABZ43nOl-i5AII1ADUP52GMCfELnxeXxXHyjJKHzWF_gixJrZUYthgo1adk_nQJP33Kqlc-sGQwblyMtIJGeInD_9KaOsEkr_usrpZKeh-WNX8K0cwpSNxQlE.jpg?r=a48
episodes.title: A Dark Halloween Night
episodes.shortDescription: After a night of Halloween partying with friends and a new love, college student Luis Andrés Colmenares mysteriously goes missing.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABfO2Lr8w82gIXXnOFQ0Krbv7cnJ14aS9UZ4T8omauRwH9GqGBR9m0uRaNKW1Fr159m-iQlOvaOsyh2dOXNQvM-Pz_uBe1CtDsLT2xXl70TNpxR9v5b5yqxB-.jpg?r=7e5
episodes.title: A Mother Seeks Justice
episodes.shortDescription: As days, weeks and months pass, Oneida demands answers from prosecutors and gets a tip from the dead. Visions of Luis Andrés haunt Laura.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABUkTFx2icnmzYHAFYL2MRrkNLFGPEbRqw5VWyNQVzB0HT5I2u61OR3wFy3YteYK9V85dXRk3t7aGwlw3uJjQJ7UxBJfOANz18uIGJ664QnE2txNEJqNle9kP.jpg?r=51e
episodes.title: When Bodies Talk
episodes.shortDescription: Luis's body is exhumed. González's interrogations intensify after an incriminating letter is found. Journalist Salazar pitches the story to his editor.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABfki3H-JYQBlfFJBDS_n4jbDItl1RMvg1fSiyLYOIeBCjGSH832kilQBK5Mh1P-g_nqbLf4HGKl6rXV2MBFC5x-Xd9dybSi1n5AXdP1T0Jz3-BFO54RuAR3_.jpg?r=825
episodes.title: Pain, Justice, and Ideals
episodes.shortDescription: Laura and Jessy's bail hearing begins, triggering a media blitz. Oneida's mother advises she let go of Luis. A social media comment catches Jorge's eye.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABQDQarYDOOfd0jUvXRwMoycGqGIm3Lv_qMEKzy2v5FzlpcF750tdymKqAGx2h1FJU7IShzDW_lmzfNYRq4gyrySW2r10-YcqpwLzAxSRMqo0MVH3qzlgY4GB.jpg?r=5e4
episodes.title: A Rumor in Los Cerros
episodes.shortDescription: González focuses his attention on Carlos Cárdenas and is then himself targeted. Salazar gets a surprise at work. Oneida worries about her son's soul.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABRQJnKsGFad_odF9ZQaD2h8T0DzQbiGSXVS3yMNYE4slnKIHmoqWNAvuM0UkRY3dr_rJ8srm9v4ryc2a9c0ggw8QgS0UaZGvJndw5PYC8qqgiJqS_AyQ4pvA.jpg?r=c41
episodes.title: A Witness Appears
episodes.shortDescription: GA new eyewitness comes forward saying he saw a beating in the wee hours of Halloween. A murder suspect is arrested. Salazar interviews Laura Moreno.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABUkTFx2icnmzYHAFYL2MRrkNLFGPEbRqw5VWyNQVzB0HT5I2u61OR3wFy3YteYK9V85dXRk3t7aGwlw3uJjQJ7UxBJfOANz18uIGJ664QnE2txNEJqNle9kP.jpg?r=51e
episodes.title: When Bodies Talk
episodes.shortDescription: Luis's body is exhumed. González's interrogations intensify after an incriminating letter is found. Journalist Salazar pitches the story to his editor.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABfki3H-JYQBlfFJBDS_n4jbDItl1RMvg1fSiyLYOIeBCjGSH832kilQBK5Mh1P-g_nqbLf4HGKl6rXV2MBFC5x-Xd9dybSi1n5AXdP1T0Jz3-BFO54RuAR3_.jpg?r=825
episodes.title: Pain, Justice, and Ideals
episodes.shortDescription: Laura and Jessy's bail hearing begins, triggering a media blitz. Oneida's mother advises she let go of Luis. A social media comment catches Jorge's eye.

name: Deliver Me
description: When children commit horrible crimes, who is to blame? No one is left untouched in this powerful drama about those we fail to protect.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABTNxPs5thDyiO9rsHDLDtXGFrdsNX0UlXpFe8PNzYXsKNjwno9I5T9hZe39oIlb2Pi_MRPpqKvoih5-x9O6jJIQWViMvJo0QMx8apMsRufVgalkQPiLdMVfr.jpg?r=55f
episodes.title: What Have You Done?
episodes.shortDescription: When a boy escaping a local gang is shot, detective Farid sets his sights on small-time boss Mehdi, who is known to recruit minors.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABTTtPlH1wTYZZLSM5zz4jJHyMaqt_kbFQ3Z7b_8soLFyHt5zLnyvUjQ_A2ax1QVL7BD7V-X44Yu5u72bp_u8_5PfEVWOwKnvYoL01fU01gnNAtoJk-XCHSMu.jpg?r=927
episodes.title: Why is My Son Dead?
episodes.shortDescription: Mehdi threatens Billy's brother. Dogge discovers a target on his back when he runs into a familiar face at the youth detention center.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABTK9Ih6KB9yVBKMppnwy6XMNz1l159Br4dCzGOVW7bf-ZGS3yuj4Tqpz1r-q4PvOBxtSDjfs9pizaAlcogemMiApjgQ3tiBP08AaAngY_5CVSk-kqJ4bhfCt.jpg?r=3ec
episodes.title: You Haven't Helped Anyone Here
episodes.shortDescription: Farid struggles to keep Mehdi off the streets. Dogge turns to drugs to ease his guilt, which results in a violent encounter.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABdOJSi6_IUx42dxbpgJIydgwvLHZX0jcBbGD89SXdxWzZWHlUl4CSMA1oAfJfeojCAXi6DlF1UmP4Tvr9A1FIxD8YccBBLlzOGTS50GV40HkQyNWSD9df09t.jpg?r=694
episodes.title: In This Life You're a Grown-up
episodes.shortDescription: Tusse confesses to his role in his brother's death. Farid crosses a line as he chases after the gun used in the killing.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABdznfUEICvDhuCU9E_ppfF1AHU14UHRLGLtfIVUkTfFoolXdNd93rJzh8OnBUW_-WnOn31hYsALwSZEwfr4Z1GCcH24Be7czoK3t6jPSBaAqRVkAeMfuP2Vf.jpg?r=9fa
episodes.title: You Can't Protect Me
episodes.shortDescription: When the truth comes to light, Leila makes a decision for her family that transforms Mehdi's fate.

name: Mary and The Witch's Flower
description: Ordinary Mary picks up a magical flower, transporting her to a magic school. A small lie, however, unveils a perilous truth.

name: Unfrosted
description: A fruit-filled breakfast pastry will rise in this not-so-true story about the invention of the Pop-Tart starring Jerry Seinfeld in his directorial debut.

name: T・P BON
description: What if you could change history, even a tiny bit? Bon travels back in time and goes behind the scenes to save lives lost during historical events.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABa_QCDPM_c4_qv_nl1z8Ee142FuGIbgM_3OJ_QyegCoX35IAPIk0OcfMgPhLtcvKhgk4reKOZMH0ELJZ9xlQsZJsa3q9pBpuTBQTwFqkenBIxWm19nJZxOFe.jpg?r=5a6
episodes.title: I Won't Be Erased!
episodes.shortDescription: While at his friend's home, Bon Namihira accidentally witnesses time travel in action and finds out that to keep it a secret, he must be erased.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABe-O3UqC-XRrXyTTSfrJg2rsLH_Qxt-Lvo0zwlFOGQaSrpA0G6AYLDEl0Y661oKH5NoJeZw5TieZam3yda0SfBtpINAjgf6lz2urSm-tAXJy4GS6x2rd_XQD.jpg?r=cbd
episodes.title: T・P Apprentice
episodes.shortDescription: After narrowly escaping erasure, Bon must learn the ropes of being a Time Patrol agent. His first mission: 1947 Tokyo in the midst of Typhoon Kathleen.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABZZQny6gDv6buCaylbaRq_fo304SH6V8ThtSFwl969IVM--QOD7g75lAa-Ad_oW7hJs7xyFQLUuy466WfvC8o_0Hbzpzh5k6Nkpmo8ZoHAK-nI1mfI4pTzR6.jpg?r=5eb
episodes.title: The Secret of the Pyramid
episodes.shortDescription: In his next mission, Bon is off to the very distant past of 2592 B.C. Egypt, where he works with Ream to save the innocent Thoth from being buried alive.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABaLLcINeG4jlkxSnKFKi-9SukHQasqkMTE5RhCYHMU02wU9eL9-OIwLLlbd4Sx2TCE0ygV_MIlsHCIg10t9K23UHG8lP9xPdypQFPtQXEPapWAA9D2I4QqIy.jpg?r=b7d
episodes.title: An Ancient Man Crosses the Pacific
episodes.shortDescription: After getting an earful from Ream about flaunting his new gear, Bon and team travel to 800 B.C. where they assist an ancestor's risky sea voyage to Japan.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABbjwlLlxCjGLvF4VTZLlWbnDI1hcZS2jOkR0TydbqudXJLkFz1tDpC79PTMDzZstX3iO9zKhKEyH3m7TyrB2YYj2tZYba2sqb0iH6Mnu-XmFiVCIWg-4hieA.jpg?r=ccd
episodes.title: Witch Hunt
episodes.shortDescription: Bon and Ream go back 350 years, arriving in Southern France to prevent the torture and death of Celine, a potential victim of Europe's witch hunts.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABd_XhkjeNGAkiS6vna9kJNgUF8KVsmsN4JHLrkbURlXnHAC1MR1jMar1eORNpNqlzznF5HUNyGLesd5C8nzzzaX8xdoVWjFyVxNZATVbXz7PV_TMxROz2qc_.jpg?r=2f5
episodes.title: I Won't Be Erased!
episodes.shortDescription: While on a mission in A.D. 628 at the Tian Shan Mountains, Bon realizes that the group they're trailing inspired the epic "Journey to the West" tale.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABRtvkewJTvNNQPUGcRxuCtwxVHWu_LyhMuqYDiZiXVxx4bmWPi57LJ1cPquzPSt-UZechOisL1Tf0Sx5juKbh0foway51knzBHDYKb3IYaq3PZ5RGqn9B6FR.jpg?r=903
episodes.title: The Dark Labyrinth
episodes.shortDescription: In 1500 B.C. on Crete, Bon and Ream experience the dire consequences of neglecting their Time Boats. Will they be able to save their targets in time?

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABSIgX8qEkf3_BuCd_TH6Xl4GoTKUSDTJxJCEJu_Z9UR2YynJ4DEbwAzGlfMOle9RVB_zQmwQ1-6TeECsN4J8WYClUmPR5v6vYzx2YNRWv1ISk4WaGGeqVYFH.jpg?r=3e9
episodes.title: The Beautiful Girl on the Battlefield
episodes.shortDescription: Tasked with saving only one person during the Battle of Okinawa in 1945, Bon and Ream wrestle with the harsh reality of the Time Patrol's limits.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABafsjShfMbGZuriHeBl_QJ2nok802WZ6y2Yd6tqd-lapcIdm6PmEi4TIT-5JYoiX5FWNsA9jsFLg0BMHE3wAOl4GUcnCKoM5gcEtpEiTm3qQx1YRAUIl19zN.jpg?r=d11
episodes.title: Riding a Dinosaur on Vacation
episodes.shortDescription: The crew takes a vacation to the late Jurassic period but ends up thwarting a poacher whose unrepentant hunting might threaten all of humanity.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABXh-e5FAVt4M1Ghc-bKiyAcDodrVLTXOuSMpUgE_-hyEj9L8IEGGKpjPUq3OcvaE2SJy8pmN3XmNlbqbxCaOMS9jDUeRjeUi3YtfDdAGwlgCas4yI4hiIMlO.jpg?r=7e6
episodes.title: Gunfight Near the O.K. Corral
episodes.shortDescription: Bon and Ream search for clues to their next target's identity in Tombstone, USA, where they must blend in with the 19th-century gunslinging crowd.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABcoQys6gMMrDYjdG_aanZM12l7FhGu34OUZMTKrp6Q4C6XHo5sEjhRtXvxSvlz-2M3PdM-q_0ZZy26EPXgVaSTE_FOSkFFPolMedzSCjEZZ1if3LzsPaGEWx.jpg?r=9a3
episodes.title: The Marathon Battle
episodes.shortDescription: The crew warps to 490 B.C., saving lives at the Battle of Marathon. Later, Bon carelessly changes history and must take the place of an important herald.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABVnVt7pHWYd1cPrDdNgn5posHC7apClQfq1ssuQdkTPSFO-t6qxWyijy9LJW3KM0J62yPLvNSMNt7b4sXhhS6PaZu_CqMhLD7F6vTwjkIpDaedg691p_42w5.jpg?r=347
episodes.title: Hyperspace Castaway
episodes.shortDescription: Bon and Ream become stranded in the future while on a dangerous mission to rescue a "Time Tripper." Will they be able to find their way back home?

name: The Playing Card Killer
description: The creators of "Where is Marta?" produced this compelling true crime docuseries about the serial killer who dominated headlines in the early 2000s.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABXBTMi_gseeIwiNYtmXHbrTQS2ixnJdgIc6l5fUb6aYi0oLxdljxcMDfU4lY2-ep6xds0MoOMCRHWdKoP302RVzAGdR2NKJQYzBUq5yrMBPG7HLOH9jNMMoX.jpg?r=802
episodes.title: An Ace of Cups
episodes.shortDescription: After a series of murders spark terror in Madrid, authorities search for a suspect while one detail seems to connect the crimes: a deck of playing cards.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABaNELslq23USGgbjuNk8m5-JKLHfsWdZ-k8O7rWIPQUwnMLqJCXvcSCDT0usc3c-SPD04ubiTdWwiC9NYRkWUJZas86m53_UVcEL3QEFrwnVyL5KD-l1n9hA.jpg?r=984
episodes.title: Tokarev
episodes.shortDescription: The police works against the clock to avoid another murder. A survivor offers testimony that helps shape a portrait of the killer that isn't expected.

episodes.caption: https://occ-0-867-38.1.nflxso.net/dnm/api/v6/9pS1daC2n6UGc3dUogvWIPMR_OU/AAAABWuouSMwm1eI4hfcKf_QOAwWNzPnGqEWd2VoUNH8sVLhFn3-ZxJ6Cpt9msdyL-uILgD7cN2AsaeX3BJeh181OHTwcM29_iYUoj37CawqENyQXWPlAscji3i8.jpg?r=864
episodes.title: Is There More Than One Killer?
episodes.shortDescription: As the trial begins, the media pushes for a resolution to be found, but new testimonies and evidence spark contradicting theories about the case.
